price: па Земља и брда буду дигнута и од једног удара здробљена,
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
